attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: The app declares that trump is the greatest president but in reality he’s a white supremacist, narcissist, racist, fascist, criminal, and not mentally fit to lead the nation. He hates anyone that disagrees with them and instead of speaking with them, he either fires them and then humiliated them publicly just to make his supporters believe he is any better. He also uses nazi signs and is a devoted follower of hitler’s ideologies. Vote for him and you’ll regret it.

attributes.title: This app is not what I expected😖
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our beloved cheeto, but when I opened the app by cat started twerking violently🦗🦟😔🖤 then, the weirdest thing happened 🧚🏼‍♀️✨ my sister walked in and stood in my doorway staring at me 💫 and I looked and her 👽 and she looked at me🗿👻 and my cat was still twerking🦗🦟🦗🦟 and then my house started to shake🏡 and I quickly deleted the app and everything went back to normal 😌

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: Good Lordy where do I start😍. The app is terrible. It has all colors like red white and blue when they should be black yellow and white. It also asked me for my personal information? No thanks mr. president I know I’m cute and you want to text me and stuff but cmon. The Trump campaign is something to be laughed at and if you support Trump you are a delusional human being who doesn’t recognize the world needs CHANGE!! THE MANNY WILL NOT BE TELEVISED🖤💛🤍. #blm

attributes.title: Hacked my kitchen
attributes.review: So i was seating at home and decided to check out our 🧚🏻‍♀️rapist 🧚🏻‍♀️presidents app and I downloaded right off the bat the color scheme was terrible and then my phone started glitching🧚🏻‍♂️✨ and my microwave started yelling ✨😊trump 2020 🧚🏻‍♂️✨my vacuum then threw itself into my cat ✨who just had just given birth 🧚🏻‍♂️💕to my sisters chicken and it started to smell like Cheeto puffs totally horrible app wouldn’t download it 🧚🏻‍♂️🌟

attributes.title: no❤️ stop trying 🤩
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app just to see and i noticed somethings were off when it was loading.. the birds stopped singing as soon as it finished my mother ran to me and told me my father died😔 and she took my phone and saw the app and she had seizure and killed herself. The app has ruined my life and my little brother killed my dog and stabbed me im currently in the hospital typing this DONT DOWNLOAD HORRIBLE.

attributes.title: Diversity
attributes.review: I am a female Trump supporter and love my president so much that I am confident that we will win this year. But there is no diversity on this app only just a bunch of black people, like where is the white people at. I am sure this is just a bug and will be fixed but what in the world. Also it’s very slow and he tells me to wear a mask, like sir no I don’t want to because I have a medical condition so rude.

attributes.title: horrible app!!!
attributes.review:
honestly doesn't even deserve one star.... terrible service!!!!! immediately upon entering the app it asked for my credit card and bank information!!! it also was stealing information from my phone the irs keeps calling me now!! i got spammed with constant emails and phone messages... lots of bigotry 🤢🤢!! tried to cancel the free trial but it didnt allow me....
ZERO STARS!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
attributes.review: UGH !!! 😡😡 I was greatly surprised and happy to finally support our luscious president 😩 and get him back into office, but it took so long to get everything ready !!  I shouldn’t do an hour of different things just to sign up !!! I HAVE PRECIOUS FETUSES TO TAKE CARE OF 😡😡 I also need to pray  🙏🏻 since I’m a loving Christian ✝️ mother and I am proudly doing my republican 🐘 part in helping defend Trumps beautiful pride 🥰 I don’t have time for this. 🙄😒😡👹👺😾😵

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: Trump is a great president🧚‍♀️💓🤯🥵🥰 if we wanted to make the US hell. Why would you EVER give a sexist, pedophilic, racist, homophobic, transphobic orange Cheeto, excuse for a person -let alone a president- an app?? His supporters should download, or buy the book, “politics for dummies” if they need to congregate collectively to share their one brain cell. Ah haha if you actually enjoy listening to a virus talk just listen to hitler💓😇😛🥵🤷‍♂️🥺🤭 pretty much the same person.

attributes.title: Perfectly acceptable
attributes.review: Don’t believe the bad reviews written by Trolls and haters.  They do not ask for a credit card.  It’s a good place to get HONEST news about the campaign and upcoming events!👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
